primaryUseCase: Movie posters, concert posters, large art prints
description: The #1 poster size - industry-standard 24×36 format perfect for movie posters, concert prints, and large-scale photography. This commanding vertical format creates powerful visual impact.

primaryUseCase: Medium art prints, photography, decorative posters
description: Perfect mid-size format balancing impact and versatility. Popular for wedding portraits, family photos, and medium art prints that need presence without overwhelming the space.

primaryUseCase: Large square art, Instagram prints, modern photography
description: Modern 20×20 square format perfect for contemporary art, Instagram-scale prints, and symmetrical compositions. This balanced size creates striking visual impact in modern interiors.

primaryUseCase: Professional portraits, medium art prints
description: Classic portrait size beloved by photographers and art collectors. This versatile format works beautifully for professional portraits, medium artwork, and matted displays.

primaryUseCase: Diplomas, certificates, small portraits
description: Diploma and certificate standard - this traditional size perfectly frames achievements, small portraits, and artwork. Commonly used for high school diplomas and professional certificates.

primaryUseCase: Custom artwork, unique photography, specialty prints
description: Distinctive 12×16 custom size that stands out from standard formats. Perfect for fine art, professional photography, and unique compositions requiring precise dimensions.

primaryUseCase: Family photos, portraits, desk frames
description: Classic photo frame size. While commonly available elsewhere, our custom-made frames offer superior craftsmanship and unique moulding profiles you won't find at big-box retailers.

primaryUseCase: Square photos, album art, Instagram prints
description: Compact 10×10 square format ideal for Instagram prints, vinyl records, and modern minimalist displays. Perfect for creating cohesive gallery walls.

primaryUseCase: Large art prints, statement pieces, commercial displays
